website_summaries.verdict: Nothing fancy, but this gets the job done, and the great warranty is a true plus.
pros: Decent price, fairly easy to install, and a great warranty
cons: Louder than most sinks due to thinner stainless steel construction than usual

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sink!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable value for the money. Dollar for dollar, you cannot beat the value! I purchased this sink for a major kitchen remodel. Was intending to purchase a Franke at first, but glad I saved that money and bought this sink. I have it undermounted to a Caesarstone quartz countertop (purchased through IKEA). Absolutely love it! 16 gauge 18/10 stainless steel (i.e., thick and non-magnetic). Deep bowls (9") which are deeper when when undermounted due to the countertop thickness. I clean the sink with BKF Liquid Soft Cleanser and a Jet-Scrubz sponge. Sink come packaged very well, with all of the necessary mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Hudak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, great size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, great size, nice and deep, doesn't seem to scratch easily, still looks great after a year! No rust as some others have suggested, and two fast shipping? Can't beat it! This sink was >$300 at big box stores and I think I paid ~$150, love it. Easy to clean and care for.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: great quality at an amazing price compared to local wholesale or retail.
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome so far. Amazed at how much difference the extra 4" depth is over the old sink. The extra gauge thickness means the disposal doesn not shake the sink - of course as it is undermount, much more rigid installation. HOPEFULLY there will be no issue because it is an undermount with a $1500 granite slab installed on top! Saved $400 over the "wholesale" price of the identical one the granite fabricator tried to sell me. When I told him what I paid, he said it was $110 BELOW his cost.
customer_reviews.author: Won Hung Low

customer_reviews.title: Great price, saved $100
customer_reviews.text: Great price, saved $100. from home improvement warehouses. Personal mistake was not noticing drains were in the center vice offset like the sink I was replacing. Had to modify the under sink plumbing slightly to accommodate greater sink depth and position of drain holes. Extra depths helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful appearance, sound proofing works wonderful and the depth and thicknes of material is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Great sink for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love my sink, I have had it for a year and it is still beautiful. We bought a major fixer upper and had to replace everything. This sink was exactly what I wanted. It was a 50/50 double basin, brushed metal, great price. My only complaint and that is on me, I wish it were a few inches wider. I was new to buying a sink, and didnt know what I really wanted other than an equal double basin and brushed metal.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Placed the order and wasn't expecting the sink to show up for several days but it came in like two days, best service ever! The sink is heavy gauge which is what I wanted so that it doesn't give when you push down on the bottom like my old one did. The outside is coated for sound deadening so you don't hear a lot of noise when you bump pots & pans around in the sink. This is well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: John Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Quality sink at a very fair price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality sink at a price that beats all local plumbing suppliers and hardware stores hands-down. The granite workers easily mounted it beneath the new kitchen granite countertop. It's solid and the finish is holding up well several weeks later. Unlike statements made by some reviewers, this sink did NOT come with a drain/strainer. As I reused the existing drain and the disposer collar, this wasn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice sink. The brushed finish is really nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice sink. The brushed finish is really nice, and has a high-end look. It also seems to be very sturdily built. I've been to SOOO many open houses, and I've rarely seen a sink of this type that is as deep as this one. This is much better than the cheaper sinks you'll find at the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Tofucastle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent double sink
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality...the finish and the extra gauge thickness represented a much better value and long-term durability that what was offered at the local hardware store. The dimensions were exactly as shown in the specs
customer_reviews.author: Millard A. Nance

customer_reviews.title: Quality sink
customer_reviews.text: Quality sink. I was shopping for a new stainless steel sink and the big box stores were expensive. Not only was it cheaper, but it was stronger and more durable than what I found in the store. Make sure you get it.
customer_reviews.author: marciano

customer_reviews.title: Good Sink, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: 16 gauge, Nice and solid. Looks good, no complaints from the installer either. Has not shown any signs of rust, or defect since i've had it, which is about a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deep sink, good quanlity, think about under the sink space
customer_reviews.text: The sink is really deep that I absolutely love. The only thing that I could advise is think about the under the sink storage. I previously use it for a pull out trash can that's 18 inches tall and after the sink puts it, it no longer fit. However, I just saw two inches off on top so i can still use the pull out setup.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great sink, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great sink, especially for the price! We purchased a sink from our local Home Depot, but after searching Amazon and stumbling across this sink and reading the reviews, we decided to take the other one back. We are very pleased with our purchase. The 9 inch deep sinks are great, it easily hides my dirty dishes from view ;-)
customer_reviews.author: MommyB123

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sink for kitchen remodel several months ago and I love it, the price was great for the gauge and quality and it is still beautiful stainless steel now. Very happy with the purchase in comparison to what local home stores had to offer for price.
customer_reviews.author: susan hartridge

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality. We remodeled the kitchen and had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality. We remodeled the kitchen and had a white ceramic bowl before which was very dirty. This looks great, its easy to clean and durable.
customer_reviews.author: LFS

customer_reviews.title: Moved the Kitchen Sink to Ecuador
customer_reviews.text: The sink was packaged to protect it, was delivered on time, and as advertised by the buyer. I did not even unpack the sink, but instead checked it into the airplane and moved it to Ecuador. The packaging protected the sink through this intense move! Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Love the depth
customer_reviews.text: Love the depth. This has gotten some rust spots, but a very fine steel wool (the finest we could get at Home Depot) will rub those spots out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Undermount Kitchen Sink - Double Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality with 16 guage thickness, deep at 9 inches so you can wash large things without splashing all over, well insulated so running water is quiet, the brushed stainless bowls are perfectly made, comes with a template and some hardware (that my installers did not use), but no strainers, the price is unbeatable, and it's made in America!! Big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful Bee

customer_reviews.title: great sink, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Would buy again. Heavy duty, and still looking great 9 months later! I bought this and 2 round sinks for less than what I would have paid for one sink at the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a nice sink at a great price this is the one
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a nice sink at a great price this is the one! Did a lot of shopping around and this was the best buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tlld

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this under mount sink! Love that it's deep! and we ended up getting the thicker one also!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Salinas

customer_reviews.title: they scratch's and stains to easy. I wish I would have spent more to ...
customer_reviews.text: they scratch's and stains to easy. I wish I would have spent more to get better quality because seriously who is going to go through the trouble to take it out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Barbian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. I replaced a porcelain sink and tile countertops with Quartz countertops and this sink.
customer_reviews.author: ee

customer_reviews.title: Great Sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sink for the price. I have priced others for $200.00 more. I would recommend this product and company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Informed Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.text: We installed the sink about a year ago. Holding up well. Easy to clean. Beautiful look and good size for our space.
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: On number 2 and it's bent up also. Great looking sink. Just keeps arriving damaged
customer_reviews.author: Rlong

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find this as we were getting our Granite installed very shortly, and the price was more than HALF the price of the ones I found in the big box local stores... After ordering, I read reviews (backwards I know) and got SO scared that the sink wouldn't be a good quality, or would break down, but it's been several months now and it's perfect! We try to keep it dry, but with 5 people in the house, and me CONSTANTLY baking, that's just a pipe dream. It hasn't rusted at all, and only has a few minor scratches from skillet handles not fitting completely perfectly sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Castiglione

customer_reviews.title: I did an Ikea kitchen remodel but didn't like any of their sinks so I ordered this one
customer_reviews.text: I did an Ikea kitchen remodel but didn't like any of their sinks so I ordered this one. The window of delivery listed is rather large but it came very quickly. The plumber had no problems installing it. It is DEEP so you may want to measure before buying it. Me? I love it being deep!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very deep sink, of equal size. Has not regretted this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa R du Boulay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price.  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good sink. Bought it a about 6months ago, it seems to be very sturdy, the deep sink if great and I have no complaints with any noise or vibration when the disposal is on. The price was fantastic compared to other units and thicker steel than many others. I would absolutely buy this unit again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Rice

customer_reviews.title: Affordable price for a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this purchase; it fits just right my new granite countertops. I love the undermount sink 'casue the sink is tucked under the countertops neatly. Don't forget that there are no predrilled holes for faucet and soap dispenser; it's a perfect choice when you replace old countertops. The drainage bowls come with this product; usually at the store, you have to purchase those seperate.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great sink, very good quality and it's nice having ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sink, very good quality and it's nice having two basins wide enough to fit dinner plates and other large items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is truly a fine product !
customer_reviews.text: The 16 gauge quality is outstanding and the finish is what we were looking for and price is just great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A.

customer_reviews.title: kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: very nice sink, came with no scratches and I had it installed by a professional. I like everything about this sink but, it is very deep and I have to slump over other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: michelle kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We updated our kitchen and shopped around quite a bit. Best price at amazon. We love the deep sinks and heavy gauge construction. Solid!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Otero

customer_reviews.title: Great Sink - just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We were redoing our kitchen and definitely wanted to reduce costs where we could. After searching in the local home stores, I took to Amazon and found this sink. It worked out perfectly. Good quality. It has a deep basin and is sturdy. Looks great with our granite counter tops.
customer_reviews.author: mitchpend

customer_reviews.title: Undermount sink
customer_reviews.text: The sink is great quality for the money. It looks good and isn't loud when water hits it. I mean it doesn't have that loud, hollow sound other stainless sinks sometimes have.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The sink was as advertised. It looks great and the insulation mutes the sound of both the water and disposer. It mounted flawlessly and had easy to follow instructions and hardware.
customer_reviews.author: KeithB

customer_reviews.title: So far there is no problem. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this double sinks for few weeks. So far they are fine. They are deep and I like them, but my husband complained that they are too deep for him because he is tall. Made in China, I think I paid a little too high price.
customer_reviews.author: nora temple

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the sink
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the sink. Better than what we found at the local big box stores, and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Clabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is just the right size for me. Overall size is perfect and the depth is just right. It is quiet and fairly strong. However the surface finish can be a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: JTM

customer_reviews.title: AllMost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had a stainless sink that this replaced when I put in granit.I like the depth and quietness of the sink, the only thing is that it isn't as smooth as I would like but it may get there over time. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: karine m thomas

customer_reviews.title: The Best Quilty, Price and Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I was remodeling our kitchen and heard about Mr. Direct sinks. To get it direct from them would take to long. The granite was going in. I ordered from Amazon and received it in 3 days. Great price and very good quality. My contractor suggested it since he had used many from this company. For price, quality and quick delivery I would give it a 6th star.
customer_reviews.author: David N. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: MR Direct 502A-16 equal double sink
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the sink long enough to give it a complete rating, but it looks great, is quiet as advertised and so far I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Cavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This is the same sink that I was seeing in all the home centers and it was considerably cheaper here. It fit our new countertops perfectly and has served us well for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed product at a very reasonable price. It looks great in our new granite kitchen counter and we were very glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Pachucki

customer_reviews.title: wow!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't even find this weight in our local home improvement stores. We had it installed 6 months ago and I couldnt be happier. Don't waste your money on the crappy ones at Home Depot and Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wick

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Parents
customer_reviews.text: they were happy so I'm happy with it as well........ recommending this product its legit and exactly what u expect
customer_reviews.author: Joel Tapia

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Everything was great about this sink...the deep, durable 16-gauge sink and unbeatable price...you get the best of both worlds.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sink! Durable, well constructed and is holding up nicely. It is everything I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie MacEachern

customer_reviews.title: stainless steel kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is great...very glad I ordered it! I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a good quality sink.
customer_reviews.author: terry fahr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product, fast delivery, installed easily in a quartz counter top.
customer_reviews.author: John Linn

customer_reviews.title: Excelent sink
customer_reviews.text: Just installed sink. Feels strong and solid because of the thick steel. Great value for the price. I would recommend this sink to friends.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The sink was bowed in the center and would not lie flat on the counter. Returned the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sutton

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want!!1
customer_reviews.text: I had looked high and low for a good double bowl quality sink and could only find ones that were between $600-$900 dollars. I ordered the thicker gauge steel and I am very happy with how it looks in my new kitchen under my granite. Even my installer commented on the quality of the sink and how good the price was. Im very happy. It even arrived before the estimated time frame
customer_reviews.author: Angela Harrawood

customer_reviews.title: Great sink for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great sink for a great price! Be careful your plumbing drain in the wall is low enough if this sink is deeper than what you're replacing, especially if you have a disposal, or you might have drainage problems. My plumber used the clear out drain as it was lower than the main drain.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for a great price.  Very fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.text: This sink was thicker than that one we had bought at home depot (16 gauge vs 18 gauge) and ended up being almost $100 cheaper. Needless to say we returned the one from Home Depot and are getting this one installed instead. The sink seems to be of great quality, and the shipping was really fast (3 days).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice sink
customer_reviews.text: Nice deep sink. Goes well with our granite countertops and stainless appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Melli

customer_reviews.title: MR Direct 502A-16 Equal Double Bowl Stainless Steel Kitchen Sink
customer_reviews.text: Sink had a rough finish on the inside bottom of the basin. It was rough enough that I was afraid that it would trap food particles and be hard to keep clean. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: brie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I shopped the big box stores first and then looked online. I had a budget I could not exceed and was very surprised to find this 16 ga sink at a better price than thinner 18 ga sinks at the other guys. Shipped quick. Looks really great in my remodeled kitchen. This is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Duffer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sink for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great Sink for a Great Price. Home Depot and Lowes prices were a whole lot more and not as deep. So glad to find this one on Amazon. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lamberth

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with my new sink. It is quality made and looks like it cost much more then this seller sells them for.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Luvbirds

product_meta.title: 502A 18-Gauge Undermount Equal Double Bowl Stainless Steel Kitchen Sink
product_meta.description: Size:18 Gauge| Color:Sink OnlyTwo equal-sized bowls, over nine inches in depth, are ready for undermount installation. This model is 304-grade, cold rolled steel, at the industry standard 18-gauge thickness. The surface is given a brushed-satin finish which adds to its luster and masks minor scratches which could occur over time. Dense, sound-dampening pads and an insulation coating are applied to the underside. With an overall measurement of 32 1/2" x 18 1/4" x 9 1/4", it will require a minimum-width cabinet of 33". It is cUPC certified. This listing does not include any accessories.
feature_bullets: BALANCED STYLING -- Wide curved corners sweep through both deep, equal-size bowls and combine to create a balanced, contemporary appearance
EXCEPTIONAL DURABILITY -- Constructed of premium-quality, 304-grade stainless steel at the industry-standard 18-gauge thickness
NOISE CESSATION -- The tinny sounds of running water or echo of dropped dishware is muffled by sound-dampening pads applied to its underside
MOISTURE BARRIER -- The exterior is sprayed with our specially formulated anti-condensation compound
GUARANTEED QUALITY -- A Lifetime Warranty covers the sink

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars96 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
